column4: dahns: you need some type of external routing to an open mailserver, which isn't really....easy to find. it's apparently easy for you to tie in mutt or a mail client to the gmail servers if you have an account.
this must be a rather common situation.  if my mail stays on the local box (work box or my home server) it's not so useful to me
I don't use the cli mail applicatoin.  I use gmail all the time
